title: What does it take to build a future-ready tech workforce? Experts weigh in - YourStory
content: What does it take to build a future-ready tech workforce? Experts weigh in  YourStory
description: It is imperative that employees are upskilled and trained for the future, believe industry experts as they explore the topic ‘Building a future-ready tech workforce’ at the #FutureOfWork Summit.
